headline: How Class Action Lawsuits Over Merchant Migrations at Fiserv (FI) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In September 2025, several law firms announced the filing of class action lawsuits against Fiserv, Inc., alleging the company made false and misleading statements about revenue growth and merchant migrations involving its Payeezy and Clover platforms during the preceding year. The lawsuits claim that Fiserv temporarily inflated Clover's growth metrics by requiring Payeezy merchants to switch platforms, leading to customer loss and heightened scrutiny of the company's transparency and...
